name: Let's Get Out! (unfinished)
description: You wake up in a very strange place. This maze that you see is unlike any other one that you've seen in real life. Regardless of what it is, your only objective is to escape out of there fast! You are going insane the longer you stay, so better move quickly! Beware of your actions, because consequences are very apparent throughout this dream state of yours. Whether you get out or not determines if you wake up from this coma.
